alert.note: Alert for De Kalb; Kane; Lake; Ogle (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 22 at 2:04AM CST until February 23 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 AM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of one to two tenths of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Lake IL, Ogle, De Kalb and Kane Counties. * WHEN...From 6 AM this morning to 6 AM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible, with elevated surfaces most susceptible to ice accretion first. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The greatest ice accumulations are expected across northern portions of the advisory area.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com.
